text:
Hi developerteam!

I uploaded a file to my webserver taht is larger then 6.5 GB. The size in the 
directory listing is listed with 2561M.
Is it possible to inform me wether you fixed that bug?

Greetings from Germany and happy easter,

Elias Macke
creator: elias.macke@web.de
jorton@redhat.com
text: Apache 2.2 will have large file support out of the box.
